channels.name: PubMed: Anaesthesia, Critical Care & Pain Medicine
PubMed: American Journal of Respiratory and Critical Care Medicine
PubMed: KI in Anästhesie/ICU (breit)
channels.query: ("artificial intelligence"[tiab] OR "machine learning"[tiab] OR "deep learning"[tiab]) AND ("Br J Anaesth"[jour] OR "Anesth Analg"[jour] OR "Intensive Care Med"[jour] OR "Crit Care"[jour] OR "Resuscitation"[jour])

channels.name: PubMed: New England Journal of Medicine (medizin breit)
PubMed: Nature (medizin/biomed breit)
channels.query: "Nature"[jour] AND (clinical[tiab] OR trial[tiab] OR cohort[tiab] OR ICU[tiab] OR anesthesia[tiab])

channels.name: PubMed: Science (medizin/biomed breit)
channels.query: "Science"[jour] AND (clinical[tiab] OR trial[tiab] OR cohort[tiab] OR ICU[tiab] OR anesthesia[tiab])

channels.name: PubMed: The Lancet (intensiv/akut Filter)
channels.query: "Lancet"[jour] AND (ICU[tiab] OR "intensive care"[tiab] OR "critical care"[tiab] OR sepsis[tiab] OR shock[tiab] OR ventilat*[tiab] OR perioperat*[tiab] OR anesthe*[tiab] OR anaesthe*[tiab] OR emergency[tiab] OR resuscitat*[tiab] OR "cardiac arrest"[tiab])

channels.name: PubMed: JAMA (intensiv/akut Filter)
channels.query: "JAMA"[jour] AND (ICU[tiab] OR "intensive care"[tiab] OR "critical care"[tiab] OR sepsis[tiab] OR shock[tiab] OR ventilat*[tiab] OR perioperat*[tiab] OR anesthe*[tiab] OR anaesthe*[tiab] OR emergency[tiab] OR resuscitat*[tiab] OR "cardiac arrest"[tiab])

channels.name: PubMed: The BMJ (intensiv/akut Filter)
channels.query: "BMJ"[jour] AND (ICU[tiab] OR "intensive care"[tiab] OR "critical care"[tiab] OR sepsis[tiab] OR shock[tiab] OR ventilat*[tiab] OR perioperat*[tiab] OR anesthe*[tiab] OR anaesthe*[tiab] OR emergency[tiab] OR resuscitat*[tiab] OR "cardiac arrest"[tiab])
